function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate exposure to sunlight and outdoor air in buildings","Impact":"Increased survival and transmission of infectious sources, leading to higher risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Designing buildings with ample windows to enable sunlight into various areas and maximize exposure to outdoor air","Technologies":"Daylighting systems, UVGI systems","People":"Occupants of buildings, especially in healthcare facilities","Owner":"Architects, building designers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Limited germicidal effectiveness of ultraviolet C due to ozone layer absorption","Impact":"Reduced capacity to eliminate viruses and bacteria using UVGI","Mitigation":"Development of alternative germicidal technologies or strategic placement of UVGI systems","Technologies":"Alternative germicidal technologies, strategic positioning of UVGI systems","People":"Facility managers, infection control experts","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, building maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Survival of infectious strains in the dark for extended periods","Impact":"Prolonged exposure to infectious sources in indoor environments, increasing the risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Maximizing exposure to sunlight and daylight in building design, implementing germicidal measures","Technologies":"Daylighting systems, UVGI systems","People":"Occupants of buildings, especially in healthcare facilities","Owner":"Architects, building designers, facility managers"}]}
